digital_products.heading: Digital Products & Platforms
digital_products.audience: Organizations and startups that need custom web applications, learning platforms, or data-driven tools built from the ground up.
digital_products.deliverables: Full-stack web applications, API design and development, database architecture, deployment pipelines, ongoing maintenance and support.
digital_products.engagement: We typically start with a discovery phase to understand requirements, followed by iterative development cycles with regular client feedback.

data_viz.heading: Data Visualization & Network Analysis
data_viz.audience: Researchers, cultural organizations, and institutions with complex datasets that need to be made accessible and explorable.
data_viz.deliverables: Interactive visualizations, network graphs, data transformation pipelines, custom exploration interfaces.
data_viz.engagement: We begin with data assessment and design prototypes, then build production-ready visualizations with your team's input.

investigative.heading: Investigative & Research Tools
investigative.audience: Journalists, researchers, and legal teams who need to analyze large document sets, extract entities, and trace relationships.
investigative.deliverables: Document analysis platforms, entity extraction systems, search interfaces, relationship mapping tools, secure collaboration environments.
investigative.engagement: Security and data integrity are paramount. We work closely with your team to ensure tools meet rigorous investigative standards.

education.heading: Education & Learning Experiences
education.audience: Educational institutions, bootcamps, and companies building internal training programs that require custom learning platforms.
education.deliverables: Learning management systems, interactive curricula, assessment tools, progress tracking, hands-on coding environments.
education.engagement: We design curricula based on learning outcomes, then build platforms that support active learning and real-world application.

about.title: About Glass Academy
about.intro: Glass Academy is a digital agency specializing in education, investigation, data visualization, and experimental products. We build tools that make complex information accessible and actionable.
about.specialization: We work with clients who have challenging problems: journalists analyzing thousands of documents, educators building learning platforms, researchers visualizing network data. Our approach combines technical depth with investigative rigor.
about.philosophy: We believe in clarity over complexity, evidence over assumption, and building tools that empower people to understand their world. Every project is an opportunity to learn, question, and create something meaningful.

clarity.heading: Clarity
clarity.description: We make complex information understandable. Whether visualizing data or designing interfaces, our goal is always to reveal insight, not obscure it.

investigative.heading: Investigative Mindset
investigative.description: We question assumptions, dig into details, and base decisions on evidence. This approach serves us whether building educational tools or investigative platforms.

accessibility.heading: Accessibility
accessibility.description: We build for everyone. Our work supports screen readers, keyboard navigation, and multilingual audiences. Access to information should be universal.

multilingual.heading: Multilingual by Default
multilingual.description: We build with Norwegian and English language support from the start. Cultural and linguistic context matters in everything we create.
